item.title: As Preteens Ignore Social-Media Limits, Governments Push for Better Checks
item.description: Preteens are increasingly using social media, even though many platforms have age limits of 13 or older. A recent study by the Pew Research Center found that 69% of 13- to 17-year-olds in the U.S. use at least one social media platform, and 45% of 10- to 12-year-olds use at least one social media platform.

item.title: UK Bank Holidays Show Us the Way to a Four-Day Work Week
item.description: UK Bank Holidays Show Us the Way to a Four-Day Work Week The UK has a long history of bank holidays, which provide workers with a much-needed break from work. In recent years, there has been growing support for a four-day work week, and a number of companies are already experimenting with it.
